classes.docstring: """Provide a way to show and handle a form in a request."""
classes.name: FormMixin

classes.docstring: """Provide a way to show and handle a ModelForm in a request."""
classes.name: ModelFormMixin

classes.docstring: """Render a form on GET and processes it on POST."""
classes.name: ProcessFormView

classes.docstring: """A base view for displaying a form."""
classes.name: BaseFormView

classes.docstring: """A view for displaying a form and rendering a template response."""
classes.name: FormView

classes.docstring:
"""
    Base view for creating a new object instance.

    Using this base class requires subclassing to provide a response mixin.
    """
classes.name: BaseCreateView

classes.docstring:
"""
    View for creating a new object, with a response rendered by a template.
    """
classes.name: CreateView

classes.docstring:
"""
    Base view for updating an existing object.

    Using this base class requires subclassing to provide a response mixin.
    """
classes.name: BaseUpdateView

classes.docstring: """View for updating an object, with a response rendered by a template."""
classes.name: UpdateView

classes.docstring:
"""
    Base view for deleting an object.

    Using this base class requires subclassing to provide a response mixin.
    """
classes.name: BaseDeleteView

classes.docstring:
"""
    View for deleting an object retrieved with self.get_object(), with a
    response rendered by a template.
    """
classes.name: DeleteView
